import React from 'react'; import './Profile.css'; import CloseIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Close'; function Profile({setTrig, worker}) { return (
{/*
*/} setTrig(false)} style={{fontSize: "35px"}} />

Worker's personal details

Name

{worker.name}

Aadhar No.

{worker.aadharNo}

Phone No.

{worker.phoneNo}

Address

{worker.address}

Date Of Joining

{worker.doj.substring(0, 10)}

Site

{worker.site}

Type of worker

{worker.type}

Worker's bank details

UAN No.

{worker.uanNo}

PF No.

{worker.pfNo}

ESIC

{worker.esic}

Wages Rate

{worker.wagesRate}

OT Rate

{worker.otRate}

DA/SA Rate

{worker.daRate}

Bank Name

{worker.bank}

Account No.

{worker.accountNo}

IFSC Code

{worker.ifsc}

) } export default Profile
